name: Bai Ling
info:
Lacks confidence and worries too much. She cares more about what other people think than about her own ideas, so it makes her sensitive and anxious over small things. On the other hand, she's also down-to-earth, kind, polite, and meticulous.
She's still learning and growing. Having realized her own problems, she's slowly trying to become someone capable of taking charge.
description:
As the current leader of the HT201 Shelter, Bai Ling is in charge of its daily operation and combat command. She only recently took over the leadership, so she still seems a little overwhelmed and flustered when handling her work.
The sudden passing of the previous leader left Bai Ling in shock, and her over-worrying and anxiety-prone personality was also questioned by some members of the shelter. She considers leadership a heavy burden, and is often worried about how to make sure everything runs smoothly.
But she is also considerate, responsible, meticulous, and good at bookkeeping, so at the moment, HT201 looks like it's in good hands.
dislike: Having to deal with strange or mean people

skills.name: Quickdraw
skills.description: While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 33.7% of ATK + 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 30.2% of ATK + 2. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 54.3% of ATK + 3. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 83.5% of ATK + 4. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 77.7% of ATK + 4 and knock the target back a short distance.

skills.name: Charged Arrow
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge. Deal basic damage equal to 60.5% of ATK + 3, and 50% more for each 1 second spent charging, up to 3 seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, knocking them down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

skills.name: Arrow Rain
skills.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to 198.7% of ATK + 10 area damage to targets.

skills.name: Air Volley
skills.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 38.8% of ATK + 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 51% of ATK + 3. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 77.7% of ATK + 4. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 117% of ATK + 6.

skills.name: Loaded Arrow
skills.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to 85.5% of ATK + 5.

skills.name: Piercing Shot
skills.description: Backflips and fires 1 piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to 154.8% of ATK + 8 and knocking the target back. 12-second cooldown.

skills.name: Explosive Barrage
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, remove all debuffs from the wielder, and unleashes Explosive Barrage on the target upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to 486.6% of ATK + 26.

weapon_type.name: Grievous
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will inflict damage equal to 100% of ATK with the next attack, and make the target grievous for 7 seconds, taking 20% extra damage.

advancement: Restore 1 dodge attempt every fifth normal attack or after using Piercing Shot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 10%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 20%.
Dodge skills inflict a grievous effect on targets for 7 seconds.
Increase crit rate to grievous targets by 30% and crit damage by 50%.

traits.name: Valor
traits.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by 8% for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

traits.name: Resoluteness
traits.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by 15% for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
